Sentencas: In the present work, the adhesion and chemical compatibility of two glass compositions have been tested with interconnect Crofer22APU as a function of different heating durations for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Chemical interaction study between lanthanum based different alkaline earth glass sealants with Crofer 22 APU for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The main function of glass seal is to separate air and fuel at working temperature of fuel cell i.e. 800-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Chemical interaction study between lanthanum based different alkaline earth glass sealants with Crofer 22 APU for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The glasses were prepared by substitution of alkaline earth glass modifiers in lanthanum based borosilicate glass composition SiO2-B2O3-AO-La2O3 (A = Mg, Ca).
Titulo: Chemical interaction study between lanthanum based different alkaline earth glass sealants with Crofer 22 APU for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Furthermore Crofer22APU/glass-ceramics were joined to make diffusion couples which were heat-treated at 850 C for different time durations of 5, 100 and 750 h. These diffusion couples were morphologically characterized after heat-treatment at 850 degrees C. XRD indicated surface crystallization of various crystalline phases formed in the glass/Crofer 22 APU diffusion couple.
Titulo: Chemical interaction study between lanthanum based different alkaline earth glass sealants with Crofer 22 APU for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The overall analysis of resulting microstructure by SEM/EPMA revealed improvement in adhesion with increase in time duration of heat-treatment.
Titulo: Chemical interaction study between lanthanum based different alkaline earth glass sealants with Crofer 22 APU for solid oxide fuel cell applications
